name: RGBJam
description:
Best at 800x600 still resolution issues. I will continue working on this game as I am classing this as a working prototype. Its a multiplayer game. First to three wins. You can only score when player colour matches goal colour. Players collide and colour is reset.Let me know how it goes.

Player 1 keys A,D and Space

Player 2 keys J,L and Right CTRL #LDJAM
